text: Royal bride - to - be Princess Eugenie and her fianc√© Jack Brooksbank are inviting 1, 200 members of the public to attend their wedding on October 12. The lucky guests will get to experience the festivities from within the grounds of Windsor Castle ( where Prince Harry and Meghan Markle said ` ` I do'' ). Those selected will be able to watch the royals and guests arrive, listen to a live broadcast of the ceremony, and see the couple make their first appearance as newlyweds when they exit the chapel. They'll also be able to see the pair embark on a carriage ride through Windsor, according to Buckingham Palace. Applicants must be over five years old ( children under 16 must be accompanied by an adult ) and living at a U. K. or British Forces address (
